name: Wanderlust
description: Wanderlust is a first person exploration game were you take a long journey between worlds. The adventure takes place in the dreams of a man addicted to consuming illegal substances. The game mainly consists to explore and feel the surrounding environment of a fantastic world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Compatible with SSE2 instruction set. Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with level 9.3 capability capabilities. Storage: 50 MB available space
